name: icon-preview
description: Preview icons in the gutter from @preview tags - supports Lucide and more

iconPreview.imageSize.description: Size of the icon in pixels (defaults to editor.fontSize if not set)

iconPreview.svgColor.description: Color to use for SVG icons (replaces currentColor)

enumDescriptions: Show icon in the gutter (left of line numbers, may overlap with breakpoints)
Show icon inline before the code (does not overlap with breakpoints)
iconPreview.position.description: Where to display the preview icon

iconPreview.cacheMaxAgeDays.description: Maximum age of cached images in days. Older cache files will be automatically cleaned up.

scripts.reinstall: npm run compile && npx vsce package --no-dependencies && /Applications/Visual\ Studio\ Code.app/Contents/Resources/app/bin/code --install-extension icon-preview-0.1.1.vsix --force
